trans-unit.source: Defines a decoder for bitmap (BMP) encoded images.
trans-unit.target: 定義點陣圖 (BMP) 編碼影像的解碼器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BmpBitmapDecoder" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BmpBitmapDecoder" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Bitmap stream to decode.
trans-unit.target: 要解碼的點陣圖資料流。

trans-unit.source: Initialization options for the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖影像的初始化選項。

trans-unit.source: The cache method to use for the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 用於點陣圖影像的快取方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BmpBitmapDecoder" /> from the specified file stream with the specified <paramref name="createOptions" /> and <paramref name="cacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <paramref name="createOptions" /> 和 <paramref name="cacheOption" />，從指定的檔案資料流初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BmpBitmapDecoder" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the decoder is created.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad>快取選項，如果您想要關閉`bitmapStream`建立解碼器之後。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand>快取選項會保留存取的資料流，直到需要點陣圖並清理工作由記憶體回收行程。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BmpBitmapDecoder> from a file stream.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的執行個體，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BmpBitmapDecoder>從檔案資料流。

trans-unit.source: The decoded image is used as the source of an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用已解碼的映像的來源<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="bitmapStream" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bitmapStream" /> 值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="bitmapStream" /> is not a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bmp-md.md)] encoded image.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bitmapStream" /> 不是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bmp-md.md)] 編碼的影像。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that identifies the bitmap to decode.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，會識別要解碼的點陣圖。

trans-unit.source: Initialization options for the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖影像的初始化選項。

trans-unit.source: The cache method to use for the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 用於點陣圖影像的快取方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BmpBitmapDecoder" /> from the specified <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <paramref name="createOptions" /> and <paramref name="cacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <paramref name="createOptions" /> 和 <paramref name="cacheOption" />，從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BmpBitmapDecoder" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BmpBitmapDecoder> from a <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的執行個體，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BmpBitmapDecoder>從<xref:System.Uri>。

trans-unit.source: The decoded image is used as the source of an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用已解碼的映像的來源<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="bitmapUri" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bitmapUri" /> 值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="bitmapUri" /> is not a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bmp-md.md)] encoded image.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bitmapUri" /> 不是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bmp-md.md)] 編碼的影像。
